1.subj: GMA Error 1: There is an uncaught error in the code.
1.msg: There is an uncaught error in the code. Akshat should work on a fix as soon as possible. The traceback is given below:{traceback}

2.subj: GMA Error 2: There are no FTOs found by the scrape at stage {stage}.
2.msg: There is no action required from the field team. The code should continue to run normally.

3.subj: GMA Error 3: There was an error adding the new FTO nos. in the FTO queue.
3.msg: In case this happens 2 days in a row, Akshat, Anwesha, or Tanya should manually update the FTO queue.

4.subj: GMA Error 4: There was an error creating the primary key after the FTO queue update.
4.msg: Akshat should log in to the database and manually create the new key.

5.subj: GMA Error 5: There was an error in the SQL queries which get the scraped data from the database.
5.msg: If this happens 2 days in a row, Akshat, Anwesha or Tanya should get the data manually.

6.subj: GMA Error 6: There was an error merging the transactions data with the banks and accounts tables.
6.msg: If this happens 2 days in a row, Akshat, Anwesha or Tanya should get the data manually.

7.subj: GMA Error 7: There was an error sending the scraped and merged data to a .csv file on the cloud computer.
7.msg: Akshat should send the transactions data to a .csv file manually.

8.subj: GMA Error 8: There was an error uploading the transactions .csv file to Dropbox.
8.msg: If this happens 2 days in a row, Akshat, Anwesha, or Tanya should rerun the Dropbox data upload manually.

9.subj: GMA Error 9: There was an error uploading the transactions .csv file to AWS S3 on Cyberduck.
9.msg: If this happens 2 days in a row, Akshat, Anwesha, or Tanya should rerun the Dropbox data upload manually.

10.subj: GMA Error 10: There was an error updating the FTO types in the FTO tracker.
10.msg: Akshat should manually run the update on the same day as this error happens.

11.subj: GMA Error 11: There was an error in the daily progress calculator.
11.msg: There is no action required from the team. Everything should continue to work normally in the next run.

12.subj: GMA Error 12: There was an error calculating the log size.
12.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should log in to the EC2 instance and upload the log manually.

13.subj: GMA Error 13: There was an error uploading the log to Dropbox.
13.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should log in to the EC2 instance and upload the log manually.

14.subj: GMA Error 14: There was an error uploading the log to S3.
14.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should log in to the EC2 instance and upload the log manually.

15.subj: GMA Error 15: There was an error adding the enrolment camp data to the field data table.
15.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should upload upload the data manually.

16.subj: GMA Error 16: There was an error creating the primary key of the field data table in the script generation.
16.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should log in to the database and create the key manually.

17.subj: GMA Error 17: There was an error getting the field data from the database.
17.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should re-run the program manually.

18.subj: GMA Error 18: There was an error ensuring the JCN format.

19.subj: GMA Error 19: There was an error getting the queue data from the table to create the calling script.
19.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should re-run the program manually.

20.subj: GMA Error 20: There was an error getting the transactions data from the table to create the calling script.
20.msg: There is no action required from the field team. Akshat should re-run program manually.
